about_the_game:
This DLC is for the ones who liked the game and want more levels!
It adds 18 more levels to the game.

Please notice this DLC does not add more girls, it just adds some more levels with the girls you already have.
Warning: if you're not ready to play hard levels, this DLC is probably not for you.
The new levels are available after the base ones are complete (levels 53-69).

content_descriptors.notes: Might be not safe for work. Contains Sexual Content & Nudity.

detailed_description:
This DLC is for the ones who liked the game and want more levels!
It adds 18 more levels to the game.

Please notice this DLC does not add more girls, it just adds some more levels with the girls you already have.
Warning: if you're not ready to play hard levels, this DLC is probably not for you.
The new levels are available after the base ones are complete (levels 53-69).
legal_notice:
Original artworks by WindWalker.

This game is a work of fiction. All characters or associations are a product of author's imagination; names, characters, places and incidents either are products of the author’s imagination or are used fictitiously. Any resemblance to other products or people (living or dead) or places is entirely coincidental.

Every appearing character is over 18 years old.
name: Poon Puzzle Hard Levels DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 +
  • Processor: Intel Core i5+ / AMD Ryzen 5
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 +
  • Processor: Intel Core i5+ / AMD Ryzen 5

short_description: 18 more levels of increased difficulty for puzzle lovers
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Korean*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
